name: Nahm Jim Sauce with Fresh Prawns
details: This spicy nahm jim sauce is chock full of fresh chillies and herbs, giving your tastebuds a total party. Garlicky, herby, tangy and spicy all at once, nahm jim isn’t your average seafood sauce, but is all the better for it.

name: Thai Chicken Fried Rice
details: A classic fried rice is a wondrous thing, and this recipe features perfectly coated grains of rice, juicy chicken strips and pops of tomato coupled with an umami-bomb of a stir-fry sauce.

name: Thai Salmon and Herb Salad
details: This is the last piece to your dinner party puzzle. Every good dinner party has at least one salad on the table, but this one is NOT your average salad.

name: Thai Coconut Chicken Soup
details: Warming and authentic Tom Kha Gai  (Thai Coconut Chicken Soup). This flavorful Thai recipe is very adaptable and can be made in an instant pot or on the stove-top, perfect for chilly evenings.

name: Thai Drunken Noodles
details: Thai Drunken Noodles are the perfect 30-minute weeknight dinner – spicy, saucy and full of bold umami flavor-can be made w/ chicken, shrimp or crispy tofu!

name: Thai Pineapple Curry
details: Thai Pineapple Curry is an incredibly easy and tasty recipe to whip up for a quick lunch or dinner. This 20-minute version is full of healthy vegetables,  fresh pineapple and your choice of Chicken or Tofu, and bathed in most fragrant coconut red curry sauce.
